channel.title: Pizza on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Grimaldi's Pizzeria
item.description: Lombardi’s or Grimaldi’s? That’s the age old question when it comes to pizza in New York City. Grimaldi’s is the other gourmet pizza place that often rivals Lombardi’s (see my post of it here). Grimaldi’s opened up another new location in Los Angeles (El Segundo), and I went to try it out. This is restaurant #8 on my 2014 LA food expedition. Note for 2022 migration: this is an old post from my other defunct blog.
